help.title: Help
help.subtitle: Get help and support for using the application

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Main dashboard with metrics and recent activities
dashboard.technical: Synthesis interface using real-time metrics and graphics components
dashboard.functional: Quickly visualize the general state of your real estate portfolio, revenue, pending tasks and important alerts

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Complete management of your real estate portfolio
properties.technical: Complete CRUD with document upload, geolocation and modification history
properties.functional: Create, modify and track your real estate properties: apartments, houses, commercial premises. Manage characteristics, photos, documents and location

tenants.title: Tenants
tenants.technical: Profile management system with payment history and associated documents
tenants.functional: Manage tenants' personal information, rental history, identity documents and track contractual relationships

roommates.title: Roommates
roommates.technical: Extension of the tenant system with multiple relationship management and charge distribution
roommates.functional: Track roommates, manage rent and charge distribution, coordinate shared responsibilities

contracts.title: Contracts
contracts.description: Creation and management of leases and contracts
contracts.technical: Contract generator with customizable templates and electronic signature
contracts.functional: Create rental leases, manage renewals, track deadlines and contractual conditions

inspections.title: Property Inspections
inspections.technical: Dynamic forms with photo upload and automatic PDF report generation
inspections.functional: Conduct move-in and move-out inspections, document property condition with photos and detailed observations

rentManagement.title: Rent Management
rentManagement.technical: Automatic billing system with payment gateway integration
rentManagement.functional: Generate receipts, track payments, manage delays and automatic reminders

rentalCharges.title: Rental Charges
rentalCharges.technical: Calculation engine with customizable distribution rules and variation history
rentalCharges.functional: Calculate and distribute common charges, manage provisions and annual adjustments

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.technical: Ticket system with approval workflow and service provider tracking
maintenance.functional: Plan and track maintenance interventions, manage tenant requests and coordinate service providers

messages.title: Messages
messages.technical: Real-time messaging system with push notifications and history
messages.functional: Communicate with your tenants, send important notifications and maintain an exchange history

taxes.title: Tax Declarations
taxes.description: Preparation of declarations and tax reporting
taxes.technical: Tax report generator with accounting export and secure archiving
taxes.functional: Prepare your tax declarations, generate rental income statements and export accounting data

website.title: Website
website.technical: Integrated CMS with SEO optimization and performance analytics
website.functional: Create and manage your showcase website, publish your listings and analyze traffic and performance

settings.title: Settings
settings.technical: Administration interface with permission management and system configuration
settings.functional: Configure your company, manage users and permissions, set up integrations and backups
